Name: Nature Escapes 2
About the game: Nature Escapes returns with another beautiful collection of fun hidden object scenes! Relax and unwind as you search for hidden objects and play fun mini-games! Escape to nature in beautifully created garden scenes. Seach for hidden objects, play fun and challenging mini-games, and enjoy the relaxing music. Complete your own beautiful garden scene and learn about different plants from all over the world. FEATURES 24 chapters of nature fun! Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames! Fun facts about fun plants! Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes! Decorate your very own garden! COLLECTOR'S EDITION 6 extra locations 12 minigames Downloadable wallpapers Music player Additional plants and flowers Explore the developer's own plant children. Explore and relax with Nature Escapes!
